metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10018 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: WebKitGTK through 2.26.4 and WPE WebKit through 2.26.4 (which are the versions right before 2.28.0) contains a memory corruption issue (use-after-free) that may lead to arbitrary code execution. This issue has been fixed in 2.28.0 with improved memory handling.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.0-1ubuntu2').
